chapters.title: Ahalya's Divine Creation
chapters.description: Ahalya, the most beautiful woman, is created by Brahma and married to the sage Gautama.

chapters.title: Indra's Deception
chapters.description: Indra, enchanted by Ahalya's beauty, disguises himself as Gautama and deceives her.

chapters.title: Gautama's Wrath
chapters.description: Discovering the deception, sage Gautama curses Ahalya to turn into stone.

chapters.title: Ahalya's Redemption
chapters.description: Years later, Lord Rama visits the ashram and releases Ahalya from the curse by his divine touch.

chapters.title: Lessons of Dharma
chapters.description: The tale teaches the importance of dharma and the consequences of deception.
